page.title: 20DOMESDAY SURYEY; METHODOLOGY
page.content:
In days of old man made a list, Of birds and beasts and man, No sheep, nor crop nor land was missed, The Domesday book began.
Once more the Royal Commission has asked, Another list to be made, And so we are to bridge the past, Our Domesday book to aid.
This work was done by the top junior class and the two first year senior classes of Whitefriars school. It gives our impressions of the day (4.7.1985) that we spent in our area. Our teachers set up visits and interviews and asked us to carefully observe; especially the flowers. The work probably says a lot about us!!!!!
